statement.p: A floor plan has a \displaystyle{32} : 1 scale. On the drawing, one of the rooms measures \displaystyle{2}\displaystyle\frac{{7}}{{8}}" by \displaystyle{3}\displaystyle\frac{{3}}{{8}}". Show answers to the nearest .01 The actual dimensions would be: feet by: feet. The area of the room would be square feet.
